# The Pandogs Games

> We are a small video game studio located in Vigo, where we strive to turn our ideas into video games.

## Games

- [Polaris](https://thepandogsgames.itch.io/polaris-remake)
- [Hop-Hop! Pandog!](https://thepandogsgames.itch.io/hop-hop-pandog)
- [KnightMadness](https://thepandogsgames.itch.io/knightmadness): A strategy game where you control a knight chess
piece to eat all the pawns that constantly spawn on a small 4x4 board. Face the endless horde again and again
to master your movements and reach a higher score.

## Social

- [Twitter / X](https://x.com/ThePandogsGames)
- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/thepandogsgames/)
- [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-pandogs-games/)
